p: Community-based source reduction by treating mosquito breeding sites has been tried in a number of locations ( Al-Muhandis and Hunter, 2011, Ballenger-Browning and Elder, 2009, Erlanger et al., 2008). However, even the most site-specific community-based campaigns have limitations. These strategies require education of local people and resource-intensive education is needed to reach the large number of people necessary to wage an effective campaign. Community-based campaigns struggle with campaign fatigue.
